plot: Documentary about the inauguration of the "Exposición de Bellas Artes" (Arts Exposition) in Zaragoza, with the assistance of several artists and personalities from Spain and France.
title: Inauguración de la exposición hispano-francesa
plot_es: Documentary about the inauguration of the "Exposición de Bellas Artes" (Arts Exposition) in Zaragoza, with the assistance of several artists and personalities from Spain and France.
plot_en: Documentary about the inauguration of the "Exposición de Bellas Artes" (Arts Exposition) in Zaragoza, with the assistance of several artists and personalities from Spain and France.
